thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Steve Procter
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Steve Procter

author: Steve Procter
title: Steve Procter
text:
I bought several products for X-Mas gifts - 3 of those do not work - I have tried to contact Tomtop but never got a response, then on Facebook I left a bad review, I got a private message a couple of days later with 3 words:
"What's your problem"
I replied stating that I have 3 items, one is a drone so not cheap, and they do not work, I stated that all my previous emails have been ignored and that I want it resolving by exchange or refund - I have never received a reply although the message was read a day later!
AVOID THIS STORE AT ALL COSTS!
They sell crap and have no warranty system!
